timeline.title: USThing
timeline.subtitle: Senior Developer & Designer

highlights.title: Skills
highlights.subtitle: Software Design & Development, Team Development, CI/CD Pipelining, UITest, UI/UX Design (Sketch, Adobe XD)

timeline.details: USThing is a student-developed campus app for HKUST, in collaborating with the University. I work closely in a team as a lead developer, focusing on iOS development, architectural design and DevOps. Other than these focus, I participate in HR, UI/UX Design, Public Relation and other development tasks in Android & Backend. Being the PIC of USThing, I have adminstrated the team of size 30.
